data.text: Anisoadehunu a Awurade Onyankopɔn daa no adi faa Edom asase ho kyerɛɛ Obadia nie:
Awurade ka kyerɛ Edom sɛ:
Wayɛ ahantan adaadaa wo ho,
Sɛ wotu kɔ ewiem sɛ akɔdeɛ,
“Sɛ akorɔmfoɔ ba wo so a,
Na wo Esau deɛ wɔbɛwia wʼademudeɛ
Wɔn a wo ne wɔn wɔ nkabom nyinaa
“Saa ɛda no,” Awurade na ɔseɛ,

Ao Teman1.9 Teman: Teman kyerɛ Edom nyinaa sɛdeɛ Yeremia ka wɔ Yer 49.7,20. Teman asekyerɛ yɛ “anafoɔ”. Saa din yi tumi yɛ Edom a ɛyɛ anafoɔ asase. Ebinom nso kyerɛ Teman ase sɛ Tawilan a ɛda borɔfokwansin mmiɛnsa wɔ Petra apueeɛ fam. wʼakofoɔ bɛbɔ hu
Esiane basabasayɛ a woyɛ tiaa wo nua Yakob no enti
Ɛda a wogyinaa ntentenso hwɛɛ no haa,
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wobu wo nua animtiaa
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wode nsrabɔ
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wotɛ wɔn nkwantanan soɔ
“Awurade ɛda no abɛn
Sɛdeɛ mononom nsã wɔ me bepɔ kronkron so no,
Na ɔgyeɛ bɛba Sion bepɔ so
Yakob efie bɛyɛ ogya
Nkurɔfoɔ a wɔfiri Negeb no
Nipakuo a wɔyɛ Israel atukɔfoɔ
Agyefoɔ bɛkɔ Sion bepɔ so,
